Summary: 5 objects hovering, flying in formation and very close to each other.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailson the night of 2\5\09 at approx 2320 hrs i noticed 5 objects that were hovering in the sky around the academy rd exit. i was driving up 95 north from philadelphia. these objects started to move very slowing . i followed them all the way up 95 to the new hope exit. they were also flying in formation and flying very close to each other at times. they were not helecopters some had a boomarang shape, other did not. people were pulling over and slowing down to try to figure out what the hell they were looking at. i called a co- worker on my cell phone who was driving up 95 as well and asked him if he saw these things. he said he did and had no idea what they were. while i was talking to him my cell phone went dead in a area i never lose cell. by the time i got to the new hope exit i pulled over and watched these objects start to circle the area. very very strange. they were not high in the sky and i could barely hear them. by 12:30 am they were gone very quickly. please get in touch with me {pid} {cms\jat\pid} text moved to narrative
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were 2 other sightings in Philadelphia on or around February 5th 2009
